backend/main.mo: Motoko canister providing job listings, job applications, contact form handling, and user profile management with access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping project requirements to source files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all frontend source files.
frontend/CUSTOM_DOMAIN.md: Guide for configuring the glitchip.in custom domain via Cloudflare for an Internet Computer canister.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining design tokens, light/dark themes, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting up fonts, favicon, and mounting point for the React app.
frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains: IC custom domain configuration file listing glitchip.in.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry configuring TanStack Router routes, theme provider, and React Query client.
Layout wrapper adding header, animated page transitions, and footer around all pages.
frontend/src/components/PageTransition.t: Component providing fade transitions between route changes with reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/components/SectionReveal.ts: Intersection-observer-based reveal animation component with motion accessibility support.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with company info, service links, social icons, and a dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements a responsive site header with navigation, logo, and mobile menu using a sheet drawer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and persistent identities.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Returns whether the user has enabled reduced-motion preferences using a media query listener.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for jobs, job applications, contact submissions, and company contacts via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light/dark modes with motion-reduction utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CareersPage.tsx: Displays careers listings and includes a job application dialog with form handling and backend submission.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact page with a form that submits messages via a mutation and displays company contact info. Handles form state, API submission, and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with a hero section, services overview, stats, and navigation links. Uses animated reveals and static service data.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Displays a products page with a hero section and a 'coming soon' announcement. Includes placeholder cards for future product listings.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Presents detailed service offerings with summaries, capabilities, deliverables, and engagement models. Uses a hero section and animated reveal components.
frontend/src/pages/WhyUsPage.tsx: Shows key differentiators and process steps explaining why to choose the company. Includes hero section and grid-based content with reveal animations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback. Supports both query-string and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, fonts, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, high-level website requirements, image assets needed, domain setup notes, and existing feature specifications for the Glitchip marketing site.
